comment: I've taken  Dr. Dunne's ENGL 1102 Class here at Clayton State. She is a wonderful professor! She is not a strict grader and gives tons of extra credit! There will also be a chance for you to earn a few participation along the way.  Taking Dr. Dunne, There's no way you can EVER fail English!
I took her Eng 1101 and 1102. She is very helpful in writing your paper. She is very consistent in reminding for a paper due and give you an extra credit. I love her she is the best.

i really enjoyed this course! she is funny and a great teacher. she loves to help to make writing stress free as possible. you will really like this class,but try not to be absent because she give classwork which is helpful for grades.
THE BEST EVER! LOVE HER! YOU WON'T REGRET HER! SHE IS SWEET & ENSURES THAT YOU UNDERSTAND THE CRAFT OF WRITING! WISH I HAD HER FOR 1101!

GREAT TEACHER! She is very clear  and concise! She tries to make sure everyone has a clear understanding of each assignment. I learned more in her class than my 1101. She has fair judgement and tries to make sure everyone has a fair chance of passing. She loves helping you even when you do not ask! TAKE HER CLASS! You will love it. Favorite Teacher

She is the best! She is very easy to work with She explains things very well and clearly. She has clear deadlines. She is very organized and very very very very nice. If you don't take her you WILL fail. It is nearly ipossible to fail her class because of how good of a teacher she is. True story.
HORRIBLE. AVOID AT ALL COSTS. She'll ramble about nothing, and not help you or answer questions. She's way to picky.
She is a horrible English teacher. She treats you as if you have no idea how to write an essay and she will constantly repeat herself and not make ANY sense. Don't take her class if you can help it
